author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Rosamund Pike 'rips' dress while on Jimmy Fallon | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Rosamund Pike was a guest on The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon on Wednesday night. The pretty blonde English actress wore a nude slip under a low-cut and short black dress giving a two-tone look to her ensemble. But during her appearance, the 38-year-old appeared to undergo a wardrobe malfunction, telling the late night host: 'I might have just fallen apart from behind.' Scroll down for video Oops! Rosamund Pike seemed to suffer a wardrobe malfunction during an appearance on The Tonight Show telling Jimmy Fallon: 'I might have just fallen apart from behind' Pike clearly believed she might have 'ripped' her dress at the back as Fallon introduced the Say Anything segment of his show. Fallon quipped: 'I won't look. I'm not even wearing pants, so this is good.' Asked whether she was ready to go with the game, she said: 'Yes, as long as I'm safe.' Split frock: The English actress, 38, Pike clearly believed she might have 'ripped' her dress at the back as Fallon introduced the Say Anything segment of his show Still game: Fallon quipped: 'I won't look. I'm not even wearing pants, so this is good.' Asked whether she was ready to go with the game, Pikesaid: 'Yes, as long as I'm safe' Pubicity tour: Pike is promoting her latest movie The United Kingdom that held a premiere in New York on Monday Fashionista: Rosamund stunned in a slinky LBD which bared her glistening pins Take your LBD to the next level like Rosamund in Givenchy
